title: Which country uses a 7G network? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technically, 7G networks do not exist. This is a media term, basing on guess ‘what speed would be considered as normal when 7G networks will be in place’ basing on extrapolation of speed growth between 2–3–4–5G networks - and checking average bandwidth for country, that it gettting from older and other technologies. If we consider this - then it would be Norway, Nehterlands, Hungary, Japan, South Korea, Sweden… 7G and 8G Network Countries
